name: Foursun
description:
Foursun is a 3D pixelart puzzlegame.

You'll enter a dream world disguised as your own home. To escape you need to solve the mystery of the entity living in this dream.

Puzzles require you to think outside of the box, approach them with an open mind and find new angles.

Foursuns secret ending wasn't found by anyone yet, the hidden puzzles required for it are intended to keep the players occupied for a good while.

The first person contacting me with her name, the final secret of the game will receive a small gift from me and i'll put out all my code out to the public.

Music by my friends:

Cooldown Reduction (Soundtrack) https://soundcloud.com/cooldownreduction 

https://open.spotify.com/artist/4zs9KgOy2LH0qHpywxbSdc

Dunkleshreken (Ending Theme) https://twitter.com/dunkleshreken

Thanks to everyone playing Foursun, it would mean a lot to me if you players actually put in the effort to uncover the secret ending.

Please reach out to me on Discord Levii#8611 if you find any bugs or have problems running the game, there seem to be some issues with the browser version for some PCs, the download version should be generally stable though.
